titles: The spirituall fishing. A sermon preached in Cambridge by that reuerend and iudicious diuine, Mr Samuel Hieron. Printed by the true copie written with his owne hands a little before his decease. Luke 5. vers. 10. The last words of the verse
author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.
E. C., fl. 1618.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Beale, for widow Helme, and are to bee sold at her shop vnder St Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
